verses.name: Joshua 8:16
verses.text: And all the people that were in Ai were called together to pursue after them: and they pursued after Joshua, and were drawn away from the city.

verses.name: Joshua 8:17
verses.text: And there was not a man left in Ai or Beth–el, that went not out after Israel: and they left the city open, and pursued after Israel.

verses.name: Joshua 8:18
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Joshua, Stretch out the spear that is in thy hand toward Ai; for I will give it into thine hand. And Joshua stretched out the spear that he had in his hand toward the city.
